name: Lost(My game idea) and Found(it again!)
name_original: Lost(My game idea) and Found(it again!)
description:
You pause outside the entrance to your company and take a deep breath.

Today is the day, the day of reckoning. It is finally time for you to show your boss the fruits of your labour, and to pay off all those days of toiling in your little cubicle. Today, you get to present your game pitch to your higher-ups in your game development company. You waltz into the lobby of your company building, almost getting lost in the excitement of potential recognition when suddenly dark and heavy dread hits you like a load of bricks. 

What was your game pitch again?

No, no, no!! Things can’t just end like this!! There’s only one thing left to do: search for clues! A point and click adventure game with multiple branches!
